name: Daniel Conroy Prototypes
description:
Experimental Games

Game One – Story of the Bunny (Windows)

The character can be moved around the scene by using keyboard arrow keys. By pressing one of the following number keys “1, 2, 3 and 4”, the season will change.

Game Two – Defender of the Earth (Windows)

Save the planet from destruction by left clicking the mouse in the scene to avoid the asteroids hitting the Earth.

Game Three: Maze Runner (Window)

Solve multiple mazes by using the keyboard arrow keys to find the portal while avoiding the enemy.

Game Four: Endless Space Runner (Android S6+)

To control your spaceship use the virtual joystick to avoid the incoming asteroid fields and see how long you can last.
